songs.title: Belong to Me*
songs.lyrics:
Lyrics from snippet

[Verse]
I just done dreamed that it worked on ya
Hop up, lil' play-by
Yeah, I get the Benz and I play with it, yeah
Jump on, don't play me

[Chorus]
What you gon' do?
Hop in the Benz and the, ooh
Ayy, vamanos, ooh
Hop in, then cop out the coupe
Ayy, I just want bool
See me, go caca doodoodoo
What you gon' do?
